bio:
I can be dominating but generally its for the overall good.  

I'm particular and subtle.

I seek power.

Prior to orgasm I couldn't find anything to sustain my attention.  I'd dive in, immerse, wrap my mind around it, receive accolades, and then leave.  Work, women, relationship, money, social status.  It was a loop.  

I found Orgasm and I've yet to reach it's limits.  Orgasm lets me regularly touch that space just beyond my comfort, just beyond what I know and can do.  Just beyond where I can afford to mentally check out.  It exists in that space where I'm humbled, I'm defenseless, I'm gotten, and there I find God.  

Student of Orgasmic Meditation.
inspiration:
Higher power.  

Orgasm finding me where I least expect it.

Flow.

People willing to surrender.
job: Orgasmic Meditation instructor, OneTaste staff, co-director OneTaste Los Angeles
name: Marcus Ratnathicam
